Monvvo Privacy Policy

Privacy Policy for Monvvo.com

At Monvvo.com, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you visit our website.

Information Collection and Use

We do not collect any personally identifiable information (PII) from our users. However, we use caching technology to improve the performance and speed of our website. This technology temporarily stores certain information to enhance your browsing experience.

Cookies and Web Beacons

Third-party vendors, including Google, use cookies to serve ads based on your prior visits to Monvvo.com or other websites. Google’s use of advertising cookies enables it and its partners to serve ads to you based on your visit to our site and/or other sites on the internet.

Opting Out

You can opt out of personalized advertising by visiting Google’s Ads Settings. Alternatively, you can opt out of third-party vendor use of cookies for personalized advertising by visiting www.aboutads.info.

Third-Party Links

Monvvo.com may contain links to other websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or the content of these external sites. We encourage you to read the privacy policies of any linked sites that you visit.

Policy Updates

We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. Please review this policy periodically for any updates.

Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: info@monvvo.com

Data Retention and Security

While we do not store any personal information, we implement security measures to protect the data temporarily cached on our website. This ensures that your browsing experience on Monvvo.com is safe and secure.

Effective Date: June 14, 2024
